title: All Ball - Tremaine Fowlkes Talks L.A, Hoops, Blowing Up at ABCD, Fresno St./Tark Years
itunes:title: All Ball - Tremaine Fowlkes Talks L.A, Hoops, Blowing Up at ABCD, Fresno St./Tark Years
description:
In this episode, Doug talks with former Fresno State star and 2004 NBA champion Tremaine Fowlkes on his L.A. hoops upbringing, his recollections of the '92 L.A. riots, transferring from Cal to Fresno State and Jerry Tarkanian, and breaking into the NBA. Make sure you download, rate and subscribe here to get the latest All Ball Podcasts!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
